issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: BucketizedHiveInputFormat should be automatically used with Bucketized Map Joins also

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
This is follow up of HIVE-3767:

Add MapJoinDesc.isBucketMapJoin() as part of explain plan
fields.summary: Add MapJoinDesc.isBucketMapJoin() as part of explain plan

comments.body: https://reviews.facebook.net/D7365
patch is available.
Code changes look good.

[~gangtimliu], the tests passed fine.
I wanted to wait for HIVE-3784 before getting this, since HIVE-3784 is a bigger patch and will conflict with this (log files).
If I get any comments on HIVE-3784 and anyway I need to refresh, I will commit HIVE-3778.

Yes sir

Sent from my iPhone

Since it looks like HIVE-3784 will take longer, lets move this forward. Currently, it prints bucketMapJoin=false whenever there is a join, but its not a bucketmapjoin. I think thats verbose. Rather it should not print anything when there is no bucketMapJoin. It should print bucketMapJoin=true only in cases where there is a bucketMapJoin.
Ok. Sounds good. Will provide a patch.
I agree, let us get this in

patch is available. thanks

https://reviews.facebook.net/D8259

[~gangtimliu], HIVE-3784 has been +1 already, so it should go in soon.
Can you refresh once HIVE-3784 is in ?
[~namitjain] sure. no problem. thank you for reminder. thanks again
comments
can you refresh ?
Yes.
patch is available https://reviews.facebook.net/D8259
patch is attached to the jira also.

Gang cool idea to address the concern. I think we should extend its usage for all the different booleans we have in explain of other *Desc classes. That probably will update lot more .q.out files so probably should be done in a separate ticket. Can you open a follow-up jira for that?
[~ashutoshc]glad you like it. yes, here is the follow-up jira HIVE-3965.

+1

Running tests
comments
patch is available.
Committed. Thanks Tim
